page.title: 05LOXLEY VALLEY MANAGEMENT.
page.content: The Loxley Valley Management Project has proposed the following general improvements to the valley. 1.Clearing rubbish. 2.Improving footpaths and signposting. 3.Improve and protect the valley's landscape quality. 4.Provide information along the footpaths on the natural and industrial history of the valley. Specific improvements include : 1.Rowel Bridge-small car park + picnic tables and dry stone walling. 2.Damflask-tree planting,protecting Rowel waterwheel,and conserving wet land around Rowel Dam. 3.Acorn Hill-limiting access to areas of ecological importance,managing existing woodland and picnic tables. 4.Little Matlock Rolling Mill-a study centre,tree planting on old tip.
